html:
151 U.S. 360

14 S.Ct. 356

38 L.Ed. 192

WERNER
v.
CITY COUNCIL OF CHARLESTON.

No. 941.

January 22, 1894.

1

Chas. Inglesby, for the motion.

2

T. Moultrie Mordecai, opposed.

3

THE CHIEF JUSTICE.

4

The writ of error is dismissed. Meagher v. Thresher Co., 145 U. S. 608, 12 Sup. Ct. 876 ; Rice v. Sanger, 144 U. S. 197, 12 Sup. Ct. 664; Hume v. Bowie, 148 U. S. 245, 13 Sup. Ct. 582.
html_lawbox:
151 U.S. 360 (1894)

WERNER
v.
CHARLESTON.

No. 941.

Supreme Court of United States.

Submitted January 15, 1894.
Decided January 22, 1894.
ERROR TO THE SUPREME COURT OF THE STATE OF SOUTH CAROLINA.

*361 Mr. Charles Inglesby for the motion.

Mr. T. Moultrie Mordecai opposing.

THE CHIEF JUSTICE:

The writ of error is dismissed. Meagher v. Minnesota Thresher Co., 145 U.S. 608; Rice v. Sanger, 144 U.S. 197; Hume v. Bowie, 148 U.S. 245.
